0100010000111011 0100001000100010 1 -> sum: 1000011001011110, cout: 0

0011000000011011 0101110001110001 1 -> sum: 1000110010001101, cout: 0
1110110111111101 0001011010001000 1 -> sum: 0000010010000110, cout: 1

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
